translation: This, handed down in regular succession by the royal sages, was known. This Yoga, however, has been lost here over time, O Parantapa (burner of the foes).
commentary: 4.2 Evam thus? traditionally handed down in regular succession? Imm this? The royal sages? Vidu: knew? He this? Kalen by lapse of time? Ih here? Mahata by long? Yoga: Yoga? lost destroyed? Parantapa O Parantapa.Commentary The royal sages Men who were kings and at the same time sages also? learned this Yoga.could Arjuna burn or harass his foes? like the sun? by the heat of his valor and power. Hence the name Parantapa.
